fullDescription.intro:
Executes a Spark SQL query statement. Use #table# as table name placeholder.
See Spark SQL programming guide and function API documentation for details.
Notice: This feature requires at least Spark 1.3.

ports.inPort: Spark RDD to use as query table
ports.outPort: Spark RDD with the result of the query
